name: FIGHTING SPACE
description: Featuring carefully curated 256 color palette sprites, a smashing retro soundtrack and intense action, FIGHTING SPACE brings back the glorious days of yesteryear DOS gaming â€“ back when red meat, 33.6k modems and colossal 19 inch CRT displays where cream of the crop!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 Core CPU @ 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 500 MB Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 4 Core CPU @ 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 500 MB Storage: 250 MB available space
